After initial review, we have determined that due to the nature of the changes requested, we recommend you consult with an attorney.
If you are an Express Gold customer, you are automatically eligible for a Business Advantage Pro Attorney consult. If not, you may purchase LegalZoom’s Business Advantage Pro subscription to receive attorney advice on this and other legal issues. To learn more about our Business Advantage Pro plan or to receive other resources for seeking legal advice to resolve this issue, please call (877) 818-8787.
A soft copy of the document has been enclosed to facilitate such change, at no additional cost. We are here to assist you with any additional questions/concerns you might have.
Please feel free to contact our Customer Care Team if we can be of further assistance. Simply reply to this email, or call us toll free at 1.800.773.0888. Our Customer Care Team is available Mon-Fri 5am to 7pm PT; Saturday 7am to 4pm PT.
Best regards,
The LegalZoom Team
